attributes.action: do something about drivers that obstruct & illegally park on & in front of: pavements, junctions, corners, driveways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems that is now the right of every driver to park anywhere and everywhere possible.

For the able-bodied pedestrian it is just an annoyance. To the non-abled-bodied pedestrian it is a living nightmare.

The problem is exaggerated when pedestrians have to go around these obstructions into the road.

Please can we do something about this and stop these illegal and unsociable practices.
